series_description: documents work-related injuries or illnesses that were denied compensability by adjudication. This series may but is not limited to: application, correspondence, wage information, court transcripts, opinions, mediation documentation, medical reports, and other health documentation.
This series documents the claim for benefits under Title 65.2 the
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, including permanent and total disability claims, death claims, and minor disability claims, including those brought before the Supreme Court. This series may include, but is not limited to: application for benefits, correspondence , wage-related information used to determine the rate of compensation, doctor's diagnosis, medical reports, relevant health information, court transcripts , petitions, orders, opinions, and other supporting documentation. COV 65.2-100

series_description: This series documents medical, closed indemnity, and/or assertion/protective benefits awarded in cases of work-related injury or illness. This series may include, but is not limited to: application, correspondence, wage information, court transcripts, opinions, orders, mediation documentation, reports, and other health documentation.

This series documents a work-related injury or illness where injured worker is deceased by unrelated or work-related This series may include, but is not limited to: death certificate and/or other death documentation, application, wage information, court transcripts, opinions, orders, documentation, medical reports, and other health documentation.

This series documents the report of an injury incurred prior to July 1, 2009, but for which a claim was not filed and an award was not made. This series may include, but is not limited to: notification of injury, correspondence, and medical report.

This series documents work-related injuries or illness that occurred prior to July 1, 1972 and for which medical benefits were awarded for three years from the date of the accident. series may include, but is not limited to: orders, petitions, application, correspondence, wage information, court transcripts, opinions, mediation documentation, medical and other health documentation.

series_title: Claim Files: Settlements Full and Final
series_description: This series documents the full and final settlement of a workrelated injury or illness claim. This series may include, but is limited to: orders, petitions, application, correspondence, wage information, court transcripts, opinions, mediation documentation, medical reports, and other health documentation.

This series documents the determination and approval of Compromised Settlements and Lump Sum Payments that best serve the interest of the claimants or dependents. This series may include, but is not limited to: worksheets.
